final_screen_text: You walk into a large open room with a long table running from one end to the other, several severe looking men and women look expectantly at you.

Question_2.question: Where did you go to university?

Question_3.question: What programming language are you most proficient in?

winning_screen_text: The employers look at you and smile wide grins 'You've got the job congratulations Sen! You start in a month but to help get you going we'll be helping you out a little now so you don't run off on us!', you've successfully convinced them that you're Sen a proficient Java programmer. Now time to use that paycheck to buy a laptop and start learning! Good luck!
losing_screen_text: The people around the table look to each other with confused and slightly annoyed looks on their faces. They then say 'Get out! What are you doing here, you're not who we expected and we don't take intruders lightly'. The security barge through the door grab your arms take you to the entrance and throw you back onto the streets where you belong...
